data.decision: Autonomous design workflow: Planify → Two design directions in Pencil → Self-evaluate → Blend best elements → Implement in code. No user approval needed during mockup phase.
data.rationale: User wants autonomous design exploration without approval bottlenecks. Two directions prevent tunnel vision. Self-evaluation and blending produces stronger final designs. This workflow applies to all new UI/UX work.
alternatives: Single mockup with user approval at each step
data.context: User clarified design process after MSJ was built without mockups. This is now a hard rule in Duro.
